name: Verify the GET request response code is 200 and response time is below 1000 milliseconds
id: music-tracks-and-metadata-test:Verify the GET request response code is 200 and response time is below 1000 milliseconds

testSteps.description: Given User makes a GET request to 'https://testapi.io/api/rmstest/media'

children.description: Getting all music tracks and metadata information

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Server: nginx/1.18.0 (Ubuntu)
Content-Type: application/json
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Connection: keep-alive
Cache-Control: max-age=30, public, s-maxage=30, stale-if-error=7200, stale-while-revalidate=7200
Date: Mon, 14 Aug 2023 21:29:37 GMT
Pragma: public
X-RateLimit-Limit: 60
X-RateLimit-Remaining: 59

testSteps.description: Then The HTTP status code should be 200
And The response time should be below 1000 milliseconds

title: Verify the GET request response code is 200 and response time is below 1000 milliseconds
